Description: An illusion bodice that's sheer covered in sequins and sparkling bead created a sexy look. The back of the gown is sheered with the same beaded work trimming the edges and neckline. The sequins cascade into the skirt of the gown and make a paisley design. The shimmering skirt falls into a sweeping train.
